pkgmetadata.longdescription:
w3crapcli is command line set of scripts that allow you to make use web 2.0 services on the command line. This ebuild only provides the last.fm set of scripts.
Usage: download-tracks 'ARTIST NAME' gettracks.hs username glistfm.sh username grab-lastfm-userpic url lastfmpost artist track album length tracknumber [time] mplayer http://|file | mplayerfm
For the mpv script, just run mpv as usual.

use.flag: Downloads a list of tracks for an artist from most to least popular.
Gets list of tracks for a particular user
Gets recent tracks played for a user
Posts a scrobble using the 1.2.x last.fm API.
